thread.title: Level Design position open at Funcom in Norway

post.author: mrlycon
post.body:
Build the environments for our up-coming MMOs using our in-house developed world editing tool Genesis, Radiant, 3DS Max and other programs.

Qualifications:
Experience from level editing tools. (Ex. Radiant, Hammer, UnrealED).
Have a good understanding of aesthetics.
Be able to work closely within a team, communicating with Lead World Designer, Art Director and other team members.

Funcom.com

You will most likely be responsable for making dungeons, and will be using a modified version of GTK-Radiant, if you find this interesting let me know in this thread, and i might be able to put in a good word :]
The position is called World Builder and is the same as Level Designer. You can look at the spesifications Here.


-Chris B. J
Senior Level Designer - Age of Conan
Funcom Norway
